text: ye log tumhare samne uzr pesh karenge jab tum un ke paas wapas jaoge,aap keh dijiye ke ye uzr pesh mat karo,hum kabhi tum ko saccha na samjhenge,Allah tala hum ko tumhari qabar de chuka hai aur aindah bhi Allah aur us ka rasol tumhari karguzari dekh lenge phir aise ke paas lautae jaoge jo poshida aur zaaher sub ka janne wala hai,phir wo tum ko bata dega jo kuch tum karte thein
